meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of hair
meanings.sent1: The fluffy puppy had a barbal coat that was soft to touch.
meanings.sent2: The lion's mane was barbal, making it look majestic and regal.
meanings.sent3: The barbal teddy bear looked like it needed a haircut!
meanings.sent4: The barbal forest was a sea of green, with trees covered in thick foliage.
meanings.sent5: The barbal rug felt like walking on a cloud of fur.

meanings.sent1: His barbal was neatly trimmed and well-groomed.
meanings.sent2: The wizard's long barbal flowed down to his chest.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's barbal made him look quite intimidating.
meanings.sent4: The barbal on his face was as dark as the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The barbal on the man's chin tickled when he laughed.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or resembling a beard
meanings.sent1: The barbal design on the mask gave it a mysterious look.
meanings.sent2: The barbal pattern on the fabric made it look rugged and masculine.
meanings.sent3: The barbal painting on the wall added a touch of masculinity to the room.
meanings.sent4: The barbal style of the sculpture gave it a distinguished appearance.
meanings.sent5: The barbal decorations on the car made it stand out on the road.
